sourcesContent:
{/* Glow Line */}
{/* Header */}

{trade.offer_id}

{trade.status}
{/* Trade Details */}

Type:{" "} {trade.offer_type}

Units:{" "} {trade.units} kWh

Rate/Unit:{" "} {trade.token_per_unit} Tokens

Total Tokens:{" "} {trade.total_tokens}

{/* NEW FIELDS */}

Creator:{" "} {trade.creator_id}

{trade.negotiated_by && (

Accepted By:{" "} {trade.negotiated_by}

)}
{/* Time Stamps */}
Created: {new Date(trade.created_at).toLocaleString()}
Completed:{" "} {trade.completed_at ? new Date(trade.completed_at).toLocaleString() : "-"}
